effect operation moon necessary give motion tide known motion moon two kind viz natural violent motion natural motion west east contrary motion firstmover wherein moon hath three difference moving viz swift mean slow motion performed 27 day 8 hour nearest degree zodiack violent motion east towards west caused violent swiftness diurnal motion primum mobile motion moon carried earth 24 hour 50 minute nearest one day another although diurnal period firstmover performed 24 hour yet moon every day slowest natural motion moveth 12 degree therefore carried earth motion also carried 24 hour 50 minute nearest slow motion point auge apogeo farthest distant earth moveth 12 degree every day swift motion opposite auge apogeo nearest earth time moveth 14 degree every day 24 hour minute difference two point mean motion moveth 13 degree nearest every 24 hour moon departs sun 12 degree 48 minute time separation moveth sun eastward full change full called moon separation sun full change ti called moon along also let mouth main carriage breadth rather depth sufficient receive whole stream desired use part water let main carriage grow narrow degree unto end water may press lesser carriage come main
